main event: On January 7, 1969, witnesses reported observing a circular luminous object hovering and then moving rapidly in Boydton, Virginia.
interesting points: The object was described as being approximately 50 feet in diameter and disc-shaped,It exhibited rapid acceleration and maneuverability,No sound was reported during the sighting,The weather conditions were clear with a light wind,Two families, the Kings and the Smiths, witnessed the event.
witness description: Mr. William King, Mrs. Annie King, Robert King
